Why build a web résumé?

Your résumé tells your story to other people. Employers and recruiters are more likely to remember your résumé it tells an interesting story. Traditional résumés are non-interactive and dull. A personalized web résumé allows the person on the other end to explore and interact with your unique story. Hints and suggestions can flow throughout the résumé, to help the hiring side better understand you as a person. This more intimate interaction between your résumé and the other person, makes it more likely that hiring side will contact you for an interview.

How does your service work?

Send us your résumé as a Word or PDF document. We will work with you to build your web résumé, the way you want. And you get an opportunity to review your résumé, and make updates before the résumé goes live. We will host your résumé on our site, so that you have a convenient way of to show prospective employers your résumé. However, you can opt out of this free service if you choose.

Your web résumé is a large, single page interactive HTML file, with many resources embedded inside. It should be viewable across most devices and browsers. The latest HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript technologies make this possible.

What features are included?

Our web résumés, include many features. All our résumés feature a built-in custom email-address and phone number encryptor/decryptor, to make it difficult for spammers to harvest your e-mail and phone number. We have also added printing support, so that your résumé looks as great on paper as on-screen. We will also help you with grammar and spelling. These are only some of the highlights of our service. There are many more features.

How much will this cost?

A basic web résumé will cost $699. We can also provide an extended set of services through our plus, premium, and custom offerings. Our current pricing table is set below:

We recommend that you try out basic, plus, and premium packages first. See if they meet your needs. If not, then you can consider custom. The cost of going custom is probably more and harder to estimate. Unlike our packages, we cannot leverage our prior work, testing, and build expertise to make it cheaper for you.

What does your minor update support cover?

We understand that you may want to make minor changes and tweak your résumé over the course of your job search process. This is why all our services come with a minor update support. This support package means that we will be obligated to support you in a timely manner and at no extra cost to you, if you wish to tweak your résumé. A tweak is a minor change that does not affect the overall look and feel and layout of your résumé. We will support you as many times as needed over the span of the coverage.

If you wish to make minor changes, but your coverage has expired, please contact us. We will gladly help you update your résumé for you if we are not obligated elsewhere.

Note!If there is a problem with your résumé and you wish to have it fixed, it is your responsibility to contact us.

Do you offer any discounts?

We offer various discounts as a way to give back to the community. We also want to show appreciation for and encourage people, who are doing the right thing. You may qualify for these discounts. Discounts range from $65 to $30, and may be combined. Some discounts include:

Recent Top Graduate Discount - $65
If you graduated with a at least a Bachelor's Degree from a top United States University, like UC Berkeley, Stanford, Harvard, Princeton, Yale, or MIT, within the last 4 years, you may qualify for this discount.
High Tech Discount - $40
If you have been employed by a company or organization in the software, computer, bio-medical, telecommunications, or aerospace fields, for over a year, you may qualify for this discount.
Small Business Owner Discount - $40
If you are the owner of a small business that has been operating for over a year, you may qualify for this discount.
Professional Services Discount - $35
If you own or have been employed by a company or organization that provides small businesses, with professional services, such as accounting or legal services, for over a year, you may qualify for this discount.
Partner Discount - $35
If you allow us to place a link/ad for our service on your résumé, you qualify for this discount.
Community Service Discount - $30
If you have volunteered more than 10 hours within the past year, at a local non-profit or government agency, you may qualify for this discount.

We also have a referral program for prior customers, who are excited about our service and want to get their friends to try us out. If you are a prior customer, and would like to get your friends to try us also, please ask how we can help.
